Leadership

Leadership has not just shaped my character—it has defined the way I serve others. I lead by amplifying voices through advocacy, expanding opportunity through education, and honoring those who give to our community through gratitude. These values come alive in my initiatives below, each reflecting the kind of leader I strive to be.
